ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] make error on OS X with 1.6.0r2.tar.gz
ygData.msgSnippet: Patrick - You need to edit the configure file and run it before doing make : ./configure make sudo make install The error you are getting is because the

Patrick -

You need to edit the configure file and run it before doing 'make':

./configure
make
sudo make install

The error you are getting is because the configure script is set up by 
default to use the SUNDIALS package from LLNL to get the CVODE 
integrator, rather than using the older version of CVODE distributed 
with Cantera.  But if you don't have the SUNDIALS package installed, 
then you need to change this option in the configure file...

Dave


On Feb 2, 2006, at 3:31 PM, patrick_t_sullivan wrote:

> I'm trying to install cantera using cantera-1.6.0r2.tar.gz on OS X and 
> am getting this error
> when i try to make the file.  I did not change the configure file at 
> all.  Has anyone else
> encountered this?  any ideas of what this stems from or a workaround?
>
> g++ -MM -I/System/Library/Frameworks/Accelerate.framework/Headers -I.
> ODE_integrators.cpp > ODE_integrators.d
> In file included from CVodesIntegrator.cpp:8,
>                  from ODE_integrators.cpp:5:
> CVodesIntegrator.h:26:21: error: nvector.h: No such file or directory
> CVodesIntegrator.h:27:28: error: nvector_serial.h: No such file or 
> directory
> In file included from ODE_integrators.cpp:5:

> directory

> directory
> CVodesIntegrator.cpp:18:20: error: cvodes.h: No such file or directory
> CVodesIntegrator.cpp:19:21: error: cvdense.h: No such file or directory
> CVodesIntegrator.cpp:20:20: error: cvdiag.h: No such file or directory
> CVodesIntegrator.cpp:21:21: error: cvspgmr.h: No such file or directory
> make[1]: *** [ODE_integrators.d] Error 1
> make: *** [kernel] Error 2
